high_descs: Go right and then right again to face the end of the bed.
Pick the pillow up from the bed.
Turn to the left and face the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Turn a lamp on with a pillow in hand.

high_descs: Move to the foot of the bed where the pillow is sitting
Pick up the pillow on top of the bed
Carry the pillow over to the white table top where the lamp is
anns.task_desc: Carry a pillow while turning on a lamp

high_descs: Turn to the right and walk to the tall dresser then turn to the right
Pick up the pillow from the bed
Turn around and go to the far edge of the dresser than turn to the right
Turn on the lamp that is on the dresser
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp while holding the pillow
